SEAL - Shared Cost

Everyone in the SEAL program benefits. Everyone in our group is 'paying a small pre-paid monthly price' so that if someone else needs help, they don't have to find seventy-five thousand dollars to pay attorney fees. This is a Shared Expense Affordable Legal (SEAL). 

We don't raise the costs to members if they experience a need for legal services--it's included for just the monthly fee.

We won't raise the rates if there is a large influx of 'legal cases.' With the challenges of forced vaccinations on the horizon, legal aid will become more valuable. We will do our due diligence to be sure all members are 'smart risks' for the IABC to protect the group (so there will be a legal interview); its more than a formality--your personal needs and services will be evaluated by our the Legal Team who is fully up to speed on Bionetics. Red Phone

The Red Phone Option

You may feel that you have no risks. Or, maybe you don't want the SEAL services.

But, if you would like to ensure getting some level of support (if there is ever a problem, immediate help) is possible: we can get you legal help right away.

For a one time purchase, you can obtain Quick Call- Red Phone Number. If you have a 'crisis' event, you will not be left in the lurch. It's not the same, but it is a type of safety net.

--At least you would know who to call and what to do next--and we will help you get pointed in the right direction.

--If there has been a call against you to a state board--they are bound to investigate the claims; it's very scary.

--Many of those crisis calls that we get are difficult calls to make by practitioners; (they thought they were safe.)

--Often, they were caught unaware. It is called a 'black swan,' something that comes out of left field. If it does happen, and it is similar to all of the calls that we have received, the practitioner was unprepared for it!

Having the RED PHONE OPTION will buy you some sense of security.

The Red Phone Option: They don't expire, and they are good for a 'one time use' but you must be an active IABC member to use it.

We will help you link to an attorney that is in our network. But you will have to hire them and retain them separately for your defense.

You can purchase this 'crisis' phone number to call anytime within 90 days of enrolling in IABC; it can get you in touch with the IABC hot line, and we will coordinate a phone meeting with you and a caring attorney within our SEAL network.

1). You will be able to have a quick no-cost initial discussion with a knowledgeable attorney to to explain your case.

2). You choose if you want to work with them or not.

3).Their standard hourly rates will apply if you choose to retain them.

4). With the RED PHONE, there are no discounts, so you will have to pay the initial retainer, travel expenses, and any related fees and  should you move forward with them for your legal defense.

5).If you select a different attorney of your choosing that is fine too. We at IABC will help them by providing the key information to help them present your case as best as possible. 

6). We will send your new attorney a DEFENSE KIT and spend up to three hours on the phone consulting with them about the technology, biofeedback assessments, natural healing, GNM, homeopathy, and holistic health using Bionetics.

 Please note: If it happens to you, we would like to remind you, that this is a 'duress' situation, and we have many pieces of valuable information and most attorneys are NOT familiar with this science.

We have received several of these types of 'Oh Sh...t' calls from practitioners, and hate for them to happen. The first thing they say is:

"It's such a shock!" " I was never so surprised and upset! What do I do now? I need an attorney!"

 

This Quick Call Red Phone Option isn't designed to be the best defense.

We all know that the best defense is a GREAT OFFENSE and that is the IABC monthly Shared Expense Affordable Legal services. (SEAL)

SEAL is the best way to avoid extreme costs.

Option: If you choose to not become a part of the SEAL Services, at least consider the Red Phone Emergency Service.

The Quick Call Red Phone option isn't a fail-safe but it is better than nothing.

It's only available for purchase (right now) when joining IABC.

The purchasing window is limited and we only keep it open for 90 days.  

Buy it now at this one-time price.

The RED CARD DOESN'T EXPIRE but it can only be used once.

Prices to the Red Card Services are subject to change, so take advantage of this low fee today.

Remember: Additional Legal Fees Will Apply once you hire your attorney.

No one should struggle with 'who should I call? when things have unexpectedly turned on them.  

Why the Red Phone Card?

This option has been requested by those with limited foresight and who want an ace up their sleeve; they wanted a simple level of support, so if things have spun out of control, and the authorities are at their door, at least they can get some quick help.*

SEAL Protection

Protection Benefits-Shared Expenses Affordable Legal (SEAL)

Enrolling in the SEAL Legal Services is part of your Membership. This program offers you a complete legal assistance as you need it. They will even help you with reviewing contracts for your business such as leases etc.

It will provide you with the following:

  •  Access to legal representation in your specific State. (first-time subscribers, we may need to re-contact you a few times based on your own State requirements and specifics for offering IABC services in your State.
  • If you are ever charged with claims from a Medical Board, or Licensing Board, or the State Attorney’s office, the SEAL Team will be there for you at no extra charge.
  • They will discuss your case and become prepared for your defense.
  • The SEAL team will also communicate with IABC to discuss additional defense strategies regarding holistic care, energetic medicine, and spiritual/energetic services.
  • IABC resources will be at your disposal
    • defense info-kit for the attorney (s)
    • consult with IABC to aid your chosen attorney.
    • ongoing communication with you regarding your case
  • SEAL Services are limited to ‘clinic’ issues only and are not useable for civil or criminal defense matters.
  • If you are currently under investigation for local or State charges, you are NOT eligible for the SEAL Team Services. But, you should
  • consider buying a RED CARD. 
  • For the attorney’s and what fees that they will eventually charge you, their standard rates will fully apply even though you have the Red Card—there are no discounts. If you would like a discount, you will need to go the ‘full services’ SEAL options under the ‘monthly protection’ services.

What you can expect to do once you are a Monthly Subscribing Member:

  • No Retainer Fees
  • No Lawyer Travel Fees
  • Expect a phone call within 24 hours of notifying IABC.
  • We will assist you in sorting out the case issues as best as possible and get you prepared for your call with the SEAL Team Leader.

How to Prepare

  • If you are called into a Medical Board or the State Attorney’s Office
  • Please be sure to send written copies, photographs, and all notices so that they can evaluate your case.
  • You will receive an email address and phone number for you to contact and BE PREPARED with all that you know.
  • You will have a number that you can call should something unexpected happen.
  • This service does NOT include bail or bail money. 
  • You will be given access to the SEAL attorney network via the TEAM leader and you will discuss your case with the Lead Attorney in the SEAL group.
  • They will assign and direct your case.
  • They will hear your plight and make a list of specific actions for your case.

IABC will provide support for your case as needed:

  • We will aid in the preparation of the Bionetic /Energy Medicine Defense Package (and offer liaison aid on your behalf in any and all discussions needed with your SEAL Attorney.
  • When IABC discusses your case with your attorney, all items are confidential.
  • IABC will compile the ‘best-known defense’ information that we can provide based on your specific case.
  • NOTE that there are no guarantees with the legal system; but we at IABC are very familiar with the types of questions that those in trouble in the past who have been practicing Bionetics, mind/body/ German New Medicine are usually asked.
  • We will provide the associated resources possible depending on your charges. The best defense is a proper use agreement for servcies with your clients, and a stable and functional system of delivery of services.
  • Your waivers and contracts must all be signed and compliant with IABC. (DOWNLOAD IABC) Contract for SEAL SERVICES HERE.

State Charges and Finding Relief

  • All decisions are up to the Board of inquiry, and you will want good counsel to represent your case/hearing so it will go as well as possible.
  • Bear in mind, that you could lose your license/ability to practice, and there could be some fines or imprisonment in some cases.
  • You may not be able to practice due to pending charges.
  • Part of the processes of the State is to ‘catch’ you red handed’ so you will need some reserve funds. Most people have set aside some money for a ‘just in case’ fund. Be sure that it is easily accessible.

What do the attorney’s charge?

  • There are NO ADDITIONAL LEGAL FEES REQUIRED.

Why SEAL SERVICES BE OF VALUE if I’ve not been in trouble before?

  • The landscape is changing in health and health services. Many people are divided on how to medically ‘treat’ their family members –and even if the client chooses one method there could become other issues. Times may mean that there is someone that is disgruntled with how you handled their family members’ program. Some clients will die under your care. Think ahead–Get the proper representation.

 Even if I’m not a Doctor, can I be called up to various Boards of License?

You could be called into any Board if you are accused of practicing any type of services in your State, particularly in cases of ‘practicing medicine without a license.

How much does it usually cost to defend a charge?

  • The average defense is $75,000.00 or more. However, there may be restrictions on if you can practice or not while the investigation is on-going. With proper representation, you might usually still ‘see clients’ if it’s handled efficiently and expeditiously. Remember that there are no guarantees. You could be out of work during this time.

Why is IABC SEAL SERVICE valuable?

  • Many attorneys may not be fully aware of your ‘type of services’ and they are not always able to explain what you do. If you have SEAL SERVICE MEMBERSHIP, we at IABC will have already explained the defendability of ‘energetic health services,’ and provide important information to the Attorney Team, plus give you access to a prepared professionals who support self-care health. 
  • To maintain your IABC membership,
  • You may have some specific annual requirements to keep your Registration Active
    • (training, compliance, and due diligence). See Training Requirements.
  • Acting now is vital in being prepared.

Legal Services (Common Notes)

Releases For Clients:

Get the proper release for your clients to receive services that keep you safe and able to make a good defense.  These services do NOT protect you from breaking the law or in offering services that are not lawful.

__ (Release Form is included in the Monthly Legal Package.)

__ Remember that Shared Expense Affordable Legal program (SEAL) benefit opportunity is designed for everyone to benefit for a small monthly fee that otherwise could cost between seventy-five to over a hundred thousand dollars or more depending on what the charges are. If for some reason you ‘break’ service you will be bumped out after 3 months of non-payment. To be re-established, you will need to make up the three months of payments.

Read the fine print.

__Our team is here to help you, but be smart, do it right, and follow the IABC policies from the outset.

__If your lose registration, you will have to re-activate it. This is usually attending a training course. You will be given a temporary ‘membership’ status until you attend an NH approved training. You may have to take training courses on-line or in person at the New Human LLC or IABC offered classes for reinstatement.

No Outcome Guarantees

We would like to say for sure that we have all of the answers, and a SEAL team of five hundred minds are better than one. When you choose to work with IABC, there are hundreds of qualified and experienced attorneys available for research into your specific State’s issues.

That being said, there is only one Board/Judge that will have jurisdiction over you. They will make the final decisions. If you can get proper representation, you could possibly mitigate or drop charges based on re-clarification of what services you are providing.

Based on our experiences with others in the past, the calls are all panic based, and it’s hard to think when you’re under duress. Start your defense early.
